tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE push_notifications (
  user_id INT,
  notification_text TEXT,
  send_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  notification_type VARCHAR(50),
  is_sent BOOLEAN,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, send_datetime)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    message VARCHAR(255),
    send_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_sent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT,
    sent_date TIMESTAMP
);
